TopicTitle: So if i were to start a youtube series

Articles.Content:
Would you prefer something weekly, and not so good quality?

Or something bi-weekly and better quality?

As in: Weekly, and not so good lighting and mirroring effects

or: Bi-weekly with better lighting, mirror effects, longer seasons (actually, same amount of episodes, just more spread out)

NOTE: sorry if it seems like i've been asking a lot about youtube stuff, i just want to make sure i do this right

Yup

Probably because having a video every month is slow

Yup

Probably because having a video every month is slow

Well it's not one every month or one every week,

It's one ever week, or one every other week
